birthdays1.description: Both Felix and Terry were born December 11.  Felix had his party last week, so on the 11th we helped Terry celebrate with Dungeoness crab and birthday cake.
birthdays1.title: Birthdays 1

birthdays2.description: Dean told Keenan he'd roughhouse after the birthday dinner, cake and drinks.  Apparently those things take an eternity.
birthdays2.title: Birthdays 2

birthdays3.description: Felix and Terry's cat, Nosy, have a love/hate relationship.  Felix loves Nosy, Nosy hates Felix.
birthdays3.title: Birthdays 3

cars1.description: This week, Felix has mastered standing up unassisted. He likes to play squatting down, which allows him to get back up in an instant.
cars1.title: Cars 1

cars2.description: As he gets more involved, Felix moves from squatting to kneeling.
cars2.title: Cars 2

cars3.description: There he is, standing up without having to lean on a piece of furniture or anything. He has been able to do this a few times ever since he started walking, but now it's piece of cake.
cars3.title: Cars 3

godfather.description: Austin stopped by to wish Felix a happy birthday.
godfather.title: Godfather

highfive1.description: Felix totally got high fives this weekend. For the French folks in the audience: "High Five" involves slapping mom's raised hand as she says "give me five".
highfive1.title: Highfive 1

highfive2.description: Felix not only high fives, but he's also waving (not that we've been able to get a picture of it). Usually he'll wave thirty seconds after the wave-worthy event has ended, or he'll wave for no reason at all.  He defintely won't wave for the camera.  Until now, he's hardly shown any interest in waving since his first waves back in September.
highfive2.title: Highfive 2

laptime.description: Ground zero of the napping universe.
laptime.title: Laptime

leila.description: 7-month old Leila (center) threw a holiday bash to show off her velvet dress with fur collar. Can you spot Felix?
leila.title: Leila

rain.description: The rainy season started, with a vengeance.  This is bad because Felix can't stand being indoors all day.  So we visit sodden playgrounds and (this weekend) crowded malls.  He's got a thing for escalators.  And puddles.
rain.title: Rain

shapesorter.description: He's starting to get the hang of simple shape sorting.  Not all the way, though:  there's still some intense, touch-and-go moments where the triangle won't go through the square hole.
shapesorter.title: Shapesorter

description:
Felix is one year old!

Weight: 24 lbs 10 oz (11.2 kilos)
Height: 31.5 inches (80 centimeters)
Disposition: sunny
Looks: cute cute cute
Intelligence: can tell a triangle from a square, mostly
title: December 15
